role.argrole: what arg1 is guided to do

example.parse: (S (NP-ADV (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC غالباً)) (PRT (PART ما)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ترشد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1S ني)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اداء) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الحركات) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN التصرفات)))))) (PUNC .))
